name: Paradil Grand Hotel
description: A local hotel in Cassandra that became the site of an unexplained death the previous year. The hotel is known to locals but is not currently under active investigation by authorities. Its past incident is largely forgotten, recorded only as an anonymous death with no clear resolution.

snapshot.name: Paradil Grand Hotel
snapshot.location: A standard mid-sized hotel in the town of Cassandra
snapshot.description: The hotel appears ordinary and functional, serving travelers and visitors. Beneath its mundane appearance, it carries the shadow of an unresolved incident: the death of an unidentified individual the year before, which never developed into a formal missing person case.

characters.name: Unknown Deceased Woman
characters.notes: Not a local resident of Cassandra. There was no local missing person report filed for her.

clues.clueText: Record of an unidentified death that occurred in the Paradil Grand Hotel the previous year.
clues.discoveryMethod: Library Use or investigation of hotel records
reveals: The victim was not from Cassandra
The case was never fully investigated

clues.clueText: Information indicating the deceased woman came to Cassandra to search for her missing sister.
reveals: Her sister disappeared after traveling to Cassandra
A possible connection to cult activities

events: An anonymous death occurred at the hotel in the previous year

exits.description: The primary entrance and exit for guests and staff

snapshot.keeperNotes: The Paradil Grand Hotel serves as a background location tying past events to the current investigation. The unidentified death can be used to foreshadow cult activity and reinforce the theme that outsiders who investigate Cassandra often meet grim ends.

connections.description: The hotel is part of the town and its unresolved incident contributes to the broader mystery surrounding Cassandra.
